title: Fractured Gates
description: The political coup has decimated the city's command structure. Intelligence arrives that four massive armies approach Warden-Keep. Because of the civil war, the gates are completely undefended. You must rally whatever forces are left.

turns.narrative: The warning bells ring across Emberheart. The Silken Hand conspiracy has left the military scattered. You have 12 hours to man the outer walls.
turns.choice_a: Spend your own vast wealth to hire mercenaries
turns.consequence_a: You lose 2000 Gold, but secure a massive mercenary company to man the West Gate.
turns.consequence_b: You inspire the common folk to take up arms. Morale is high, but their gear is weak.

turns.narrative: The gate mechanisms have been sabotaged by the last few loyalists of the traitor General. They must be manually cranked shut.
turns.choice_a: Lead a strike team to secure the winch rooms
turns.consequence_a: You fight off the saboteurs in close quarters. The gates close just as the first enemy scouts appear.
turns.choice_b: Use earth magic to seal the gates permanently
turns.consequence_b: You crush the gates closed with rock. It holds, but trade is now permanently cut off.

gates_secured.description: The gates are shut. The city braces for the ultimate siege.

consequences.permanent_world_change: Emberheart is now under martial law in preparation for the siege.

gates_sealed_shut.description: The gates are permanently sealed with rock.

consequences.permanent_world_change: Trade halts entirely. Economic crash, but maximum defense.

conclusion: The gates are shut. The city braces for the ultimate siege.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
